title: New: Washed Out – Eyes Be Closed
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/washedout_1-650x648.jpg "Print")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7282-new-washed-out-eyes-be-closed/attachment/print-2)

Earlier today **Washed Out** dropped the opening track from his highly anticipated debut LP, _Within and Without_, due to be released on June 12 on **Sub Pop** in the U.S. _Eyes be Closed_ is a blissful and hazy ride but not necessarily a huge departure from his _Life of Leisure EP_, regardless it’s still a tantalising taste of what’s to come. Input your email and download the tune for free below.
